question_text: Which of the following are valid troubleshooting steps if a Bluetooth device fails to connect? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Ensure Bluetooth is enabled on both devices
correct_answer: Ensure Bluetooth is enabled on both devices
explanation: Basic troubleshooting includes enabling Bluetooth, restarting the devices, and disabling airplane mode, which disables wireless radios. Flashing firmware is extreme and usually unnecessary.
